item.title: CVE-2024-0429|2024-08-01T18:04:49.784Z -- hex%20workshop -- hex%20workshop
item.description: A denial service vulnerability has been found on Â Hex Workshop affecting version 6.7, an attacker could send a command line file arguments and control the Structured Exception Handler (SEH) records resulting in a service shutdown.
